summary: Hannah and Amber Baker are trapped in a dark Southern underworld of violence, drugs and bikers. Both live in fear of their "Uncle Frank" Stinson, the ruthless leader of a crime organization.
cast: Abigail Breslin|Sean Bean|James Purefoy|Alexa PenaVega|Lew Temple|Jake Busey|Jody Quigley|Dodie Brown|Ritchie Montgomery|Colby Arps|Claire Frederiksen|Casey Hendershot|J.D. Evermore|Kaden Washington Lewis|Luke Hawx|Stefan Solea|Ricky Wayne|Wanda Leigh|Thomas Francis Murphy|Sam Medina|Robert 'Ross' Anderson|Willie Weber|Tim Ross
director: Director: Mark Young (as Mark H. Young)
title: Juego peligroso
